backend/main.mo: Actor manages user profiles and owned patterns with access control, including CRUD operations and permission checks.
backend/pattern.mo: Defines pattern data types, ownership wrapper, and a comparator for sorting by creation time.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, involved files, components, and test IDs for feature evidence tracking.
frontend/docs/architecture.md: Begins describing the system architecture overview for the application.
frontend/docs/controller-protocol.md: Documents machine control commands, formats, examples, and status endpoint details.
frontend/docs/error-handling.md: Explains error categories, handling strategies, UX behavior, and recovery flows.
frontend/docs/gcode-generation.md: Outlines client-side deterministic G‑code generation sources and pipeline intro.
frontend/docs/README.md: Top-level documentation index describing app purpose, structure, features, and quick start steps.
frontend/docs/ui-breakdown.md: Provides an overview of UI screens starting with the Pattern Gallery.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global theme variables for light/dark mode and component styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, theme provider, and global toaster wrapped by the AppShell layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/branding/AppLogo: Renders the app logo inside a styled container with a gradient background.
frontend/src/components/connection/Conne: Form for configuring HTTP/WebSocket URLs and testing or saving controller connection settings.
Displays connection status with an icon and shows error details in a popover when present.
frontend/src/components/creator/GCodePre: Shows G‑code text with options to download or send it to the controller.
frontend/src/components/creator/ImageUpl: Uploads an image, shows a preview, and generates a simple simulated vector path.
frontend/src/components/creator/PromptPa: Generates pattern paths based on text prompts like spiral, mandala, or geometric.
frontend/src/components/creator/SketchCa: Interactive canvas allowing users to draw freehand paths, with erase and clear controls.
frontend/src/components/creator/SpeedSca: Sliders for adjusting playback speed and pattern scale percentages.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/ErrorA: Displays a list of error messages with icons based on error type.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Progre: Shows pattern execution progress using a progress bar and percentage label.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Status: Displays cards summarizing machine position, current pattern, state, and last update time.
Main application shell providing header, navigation, and global modals.
frontend/src/components/led/BrightnessSl: Slider control for adjusting LED brightness percentage.
Color picker allowing selection via color input or hex text field.
frontend/src/components/led/LedControlPa: UI panel to control LED state, color, brightness, and mode, sending commands when settings change.
frontend/src/components/led/LedModeSelec: Dropdown for selecting LED animation modes with predefined options.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Prima: Mobile bottom navigation bar linking to main app sections with active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/patterns/Pattern: Displays searchable, sortable pattern tiles and handles empty results.
Two-tab layout switching between local and cloud patterns with login gating for cloud content.
Card-style tile showing pattern thumbnail, name, and duration, linking to the pattern detail page.
frontend/src/components/preview/PatternP: Wraps toolpath rendering and playback controls to preview a pattern visually.
frontend/src/components/preview/Playback: Playback slider with play/pause logic that updates preview progress over time.
frontend/src/components/preview/Toolpath: Canvas renderer that draws the full toolpath and highlights progress with a moving marker.
Control panel for starting, pausing, stopping, homing, and retracing patterns with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/safety/ConfirmDi: Reusable confirmation dialog with customizable title, description, and actions.
frontend/src/components/safety/Emergency: Floating button that triggers an emergency stop after confirmation.
frontend/src/components/safety/ResumePro: Prompts the user to resume or stop a previously active pattern session based on saved state.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: A button component that toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/controller/commandClient.ts: Sends commands over HTTP and updates connection status and error state.
frontend/src/controller/protocol.ts: Defines command types and utilities for parsing and formatting LED and speed commands.
frontend/src/controller/statusClient.ts: Fetches machine status via HTTP with timeout handling and maps it to a normalized structure.
frontend/src/controller/transports/httpT: Implements sending commands to the controller over HTTP with timeout and error handling.
frontend/src/controller/transports/webso: Manages WebSocket connection, reconnection, message parsing, and command sending.
frontend/src/data/samplePatterns.ts: Provides sample pattern metadata and optional G-Code strings.
frontend/src/gcode/gcodeGenerator.ts: Generates G-code from a list of points with speed and scale adjustments.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCommandClient.ts: Exposes sendCommand and connection status from the connection store.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context, Internet Identity login/logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMachineStatus.ts: Polls machine status periodically using React Query when an HTTP URL is configured.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for managing user profiles and patterns via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with sand-table-inspired palette.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CustomPatternCreatorP: UI for creating custom patterns via sketch, image, or prompts, with G-code preview and controls.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the live status dashboard, showing machine status, progress, and errors using data from useMachineStatus.
frontend/src/pages/LedControlPage.tsx: Displays a simple page wrapper containing the LED control panel UI.
frontend/src/pages/PatternGalleryPage.ts: Loads cloud and local patterns, formats them, and displays them in a gallery with tabs and a loading state.
frontend/src/pages/PatternRunPage.tsx: Shows run controls and a preview for a selected pattern, generating a dummy preview path and displaying duration info.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsConnectionPag: Provides the connection settings page with a status badge and form for configuring controller URLs.
frontend/src/state/connectionStore.ts: Zustand store managing controller connection URLs, status, errors, and a testConnection method with persistence.
frontend/src/state/ledPresetsStore.ts: Zustand store for saving, retrieving, and deleting LED presets keyed by pattern ID with persistence.
frontend/src/state/runSessionStore.ts: Zustand store tracking the current pattern run session with setters and clearing, persisted to storage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s state, features, architecture notes, and required assets.
